metadata.title: CVE-2023-3223 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in undertow. Servlets annotated with @MultipartConfig maycause an OutOfMemoryError due to large multipart content. This may allowunauthorized users to cause remote Denial of Service (DoS) attack. If theserver uses fileSizeThreshold to limit the file size, it's possible tobypass the limit by setting the file name in the request to null.

criterions.comment: undertow package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
